CustomField.description: Some webhooks require concatenation of header information to ensure the payload is secure. The format for this is a set of semicolon delimited strings. If the string is enclosed in quotes, it will be used as a constant. Otherwise a header parameter. Example for Slack: "v0:";X-Slack-Request-Timestamp;":"
